name: Pikmin 2
description:
After crash-landing on an alien world inhabited by tiny Pikmin, Captain Olimar has returned
to his home world to find out that his employer, Hocotate Freight, has been driven to the brink
of bankruptcy! Now, Olimar must return to the Pikmin planet with his trusty assistant, Louie
to find valuable treasures in a desperate attempt to pay back their company's massive debt!
